name: distraction-tracker
title: Distraction Tracker
description: Track your distractions and get indistractable. This extension is inspired by Nir Eyal's book indistractable.
author: danieldeichfuss

commands.name: track-distraction
commands.title: Track Distraction
commands.description: Write down what triggered your distraction, what discomfort preceded the distraction. This will help you to get to the root cause of your distractions and get back in control.

commands.name: list-distractions
commands.title: List Distractions
commands.description: List your tracked distractions and see what triggers you to go off course and help you understand yourself better.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
